page.title: 02DOMESDAY THOUGHTS
page.content: The Domesday Project is trying to create an image of 1985 for future generations. This Domesday Project is created 900 years after William The Conqueror ordered the first Domesday Book to be written. Different schools and organisations will be surveying land,conducting surveys and asking questions in order to produce a comprehensive account of their small but important area. Only a fraction of the information collected can be stored on disc but all will be stored in some form for future use. The Fourth Year children of Middleton Cheney Primary School and the First Years of Chenderit Secondary School will be working together, taking their part in the Domesday Project.
